fields.name: Order
fields.description:
Use the 'Add' button to display a new row to add additional items to your order. Where there is a size in addition to waist or chest size S = Short, R = Regular, T = Tall
If the size drop down is empty the form may have got a bit flustered 😉 If you change the category on that row to something else and then change it back and move through the fields the sizes should appear. If that doesn't work pelase use the 'Other' box to provide the info.

field_options.placeholder: If you require anything not listed above (such as mask filters) please outline the details (size, branding required etc) of your request here.

fields.name: Once I have received this PPE, I confirm that:

options.label: I will look after the PPE and ensure it remains clean, in an efficient state, in efficient working order and in good repair
options.value: I will look after the PPE and ensure it remains clean, in an efficient state, in efficient working order and in good repair

options.label: I will examine the PPE when issued and each time before it is used
options.value: I will examine the PPE when issued and each time before it is used

options.label: I will not use the PPE if on examination it is discovered to be defective
options.value: I will not use the PPE if on examination it is discovered to be defective

options.label: I will ask for a replacement when it is defective, worn out or it expires
options.value: I will ask for a replacement when it is defective, worn out or it expires

options.label: I understand how to properly use, store and maintain the PPE.
options.value: I understand how to properly use, store and maintain the PPE.
